company_name: Microsoft Job Referrals Powered by Round One
contact_details: Company Name: Microsoft Job Referrals Powered by Round One

Company Description: Get job referrals in Microsoft from company employees by speaking with them over the phone and proving your merit. This service is provided by Round One and lets you choose the person who you would like to speak with in over 2500 companies. Referrals increase your chance of getting hired by 10 times and reduce the time taken to land the next interview call.
discription:
The Services Insights team is chartered to enable positive business outcomes by driving right behaviors and decisions through bold insights. 
The Data Scientist is a linchpin role working within the Services Business Insights team. This person will work with cross-functional teams across the Services organization to effectively manage and deliver on Insights & Analytics, operations and transformation. In this critical Program, you will be responsible for executing on business objectives through analytical modeling that incorporate HQ functions, consulting domain leadership and area/field leadership thereby creating transparency around insights & analytics initiatives through a rhythm of the business (ROB). You will execute on the detailed implementation, and support of analytical models, tools and techniques including process changes that are part of this program. We are looking for a talented and motivated analytics professional who can build predictive models and solve a wide variety of predictive analytics problems - all with the goal of providing actionable insights into business processes and customer experience. You will contribute to continuing the team s progress toward being a recognized hub for forward thinking in the field of advanced data analytics. The team consists of experts in statistical data analysis, machine learning, driver analysis, forecasting, big data technologies, fraud analytics, and clickstream analytics etc. For the right individual, this job offers a gateway to an ocean of opportunities in the area of: Predicting customers  next issues to solve them proactively Implementing production natural language processing and classification Building simulations to test and optimize processes Providing analytics on clickstream data for as many customers each year as Facebook has users Using data to optimize sales opportunities, identify support issues and understand customers Proactively identifying service and quality issues before customers realize there is a problem Detecting fraud and preventing loss of millions of dollars KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES: Build and develop analytical models working along side a strong team of Leads, Analysts, Architects to deliver priority outcomes in alignment with the strategic roadmap for Services Engage broadly with the Decision Science teams to frame, structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact Act as an evangelist and catalyst for BI & Analytics innovation Manage the portfolio of work for BI & Analytics and partner with decision science team on monthly governance with stakeholders Partner on a robust, sustainable cloud first big data architecture, data lake, data mart and other assorted reporting/distribution services with the data engineering teams Partner with data science team to apply advanced analytics concepts towards rich and bold insights Attract, develop, retain talent and improving productivity, efficiency and effectiveness of the team and / or business. Create and manage standards, processes and procedures to ensure agile delivery and consistent operations. KEY QUALIFICATIONS: 6+ years of analytical hands on experience across Regression(Linear/Logit/Gamma), K-Means/Modes/Hier. Clustering, Markov Chain Monte Carlo, Non Linear Time Series. Text mining, Dynamic Programming, Hypothesis testing, OR and Optimization techniques, Fraud Analytics etc. Proven track record of delivering highly-scalable and reliable systems through multiple cycles. Experience on Microsoft BI stack and exposure to Big Data, machine learning and data mining, large scale computing systems like COSMOS, Hadoop, MapReduce and other big data technologies including experience in SQL, R, Python, SAS, AzureML or similar languages. Design and BI architecture skills, partnering with engineering & information architecture teams on design & architecture Excellent communications and interpersonal skills. Ability to convince other strong personalities of their ideas and work with a large number of partners in solving a problem. Masters in Statistics/Econometrics or PhD in Statistics/Economics/ Computer Science or related discipline is preferable, but a candidate with MS combined with strong analytical background in problems relating to Big Data and Analytics is also acceptable. PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES/INTERPERSONAL SKILLS: o Excellent written and oral communication skills, particularly the ability to synthesize complex issues/scenarios into easy-to-understand concepts. o An attention to detail with self-discipline and a drive for results. o Demonstrated ability to work in ambiguous situations and across organizational boundaries. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin, marital status, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected status. Microsoft Services is dedicated to delivering on Microsoft s mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As one of the largest divisions inside Microsoft - with over 21,500 employees worldwide - this diverse team includes architects, consultants, support professionals, sales, and business leaders who serve customers in 191 countries and 46 languages. Simply put, we help customers get the most out of their technology investments. We are proud to be the face of Microsoft to many of our customers and partners. The power of that connection, in addition to understanding how they use our products, helps us deliver the voice of our customers back to our business groups to make our technology and Microsoft even better.

discription:
The Services Insights team is chartered to enable positive business outcomes by driving right behaviors and decisions through bold insights. 
The Microsoft Services Insights team is looking for a BI Program Manager with deep experience enabling solutions with data platform, analytics and integrated data. The role requires a broad range of industry knowledge and a minimum of 10 years implementation experience. Responsibilities: The BI Program Manager must apply advanced analysis skills and experience in principals of the analytics solution engineering to provide detailed reliable solutions and estimates for service implementations. Understanding of competitive and open source technology enables the individual to properly assess customer solutions hosted on non-Microsoft platforms. Experience/skills required for this role include: Expert level knowledge required in architecting, planning, testing and deploying analytics solutions including the following: Proven experience estimating, scoping, and writing effective statements of work that clearly set expectations and limit risk Demonstrated excellence at presenting complex development topics to both executive and technical personnel An ability to articulate architectural differences between solution methods and the challenges and approaches to integrating solutions built on different platforms including a working knowledge of different architectural frameworks that may be used by our customers Working knowledge of specialized tools and ability to roll up the sleeves and execute Knowledge of full application life cycle design tools and methodologies Ability to move between high level architectural review/design Level of actually doing all phases of an application delivery project Technical Skills needed End-to-end Microsoft BI stack: SQL Server, Azure SQL DB, Azure DW, Azure ML, Analytics Platform Server, HD Insight, Stream Insight, SharePoint BI, PowerPivot, PowerView, Excel Big Data stack: MapReduce, Hadoop, Sqoop, Pig, Hive, Hbase, Flume ETL technologies: SSIS, Talend, Pentaho, Informatica, etc DBMS: Relational (SQL Server, incl. T-SQL, Scripting, etc), columnar (RedShift, Vertica), noSQL (MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra - key-value stores, graph databases, RDF triple stores) Languages: Java, Python, R, F#, C# Data Science and Analytical tools, languages, or libraries: SAS, SPSS, R, Mahout, MatLab) High-scale or distributed RDBMS (PDW, RedShift, Teradata, Netezza, Greenplum, Aster Data, Vertica) Development environments: Visual Studio Operating Systems: Windows Azure, AWS, Windows Server, Linux Knowledge of cloud computing infrastructure (e.g. Azure, Amazon Web Services EC2, Elastic MapReduce) and considerations for scalable, distributed systems Data migration and integration from existing data stores Ability to learn and apply new technologies and programming languages as required Candidates must be fluent in English (spoken and written). Key Success Criteria and Competencies required   Ability to execute and drive ongoing improvements in delivery portfolio   Positive disruptor that can view opportunities vs barriers   Influencing stakeholders to achieve impact through collaboration, presence and strong communication skills   Customer Focus and Insight Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin, marital status, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected status. Microsoft Services is dedicated to delivering on Microsoft s mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As one of the largest divisions inside Microsoft - with over 21,500 employees worldwide - this diverse team includes architects, consultants, support professionals, sales, and business leaders who serve customers in 191 countries and 46 languages. Simply put, we help customers get the most out of their technology investments. We are proud to be the face of Microsoft to many of our customers and partners. The power of that connection, in addition to understanding how they use our products, helps us deliver the voice of our customers back to our business groups to make our technology and Microsoft even better.

discription:
Do you have a passion for creating and managing complex, large scale data warehouses and services  A desire to shape the BI ecosystem within Services into a competitive differentiator  A passion for working with engineering counterparts and business teams to influence how data platforms and insights are developed, operationalized and leveraged  The Services Insights team is chartered to enable positive business outcomes by driving right behaviors and decisions through bold insights.

The Advanced Analytics Manager is a linchpin role working within the Services Business Insights team. This person will work with cross-functional teams across the Services organization to effectively manage and deliver on Insights & Analytics governance, operations and transformation. In this critical Program, you will be responsible for leading the analytical practice, governance, facilitating planning and prioritization workshops at analytical and leadership level that incorporate HQ functions, consulting domain leadership and area/field leadership, creating transparency around insights & analytics initiatives through a rhythm of the business (ROB). You will manage the detailed implementation, execution and support of analytical models, tools and techniques including process changes that are part of this program.
KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES: Manage, lead and develop a strong team of Leads, Analysts, Architects to deliver priority outcomes in alignment with the strategic roadmap for Services Engage broadly with the Decision Science teams to frame, structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact Act as an evangelist and catalyst for BI & Analytics innovation Manage the portfolio of work for BI & Analytics and partner with decision science team on monthly governance with stakeholders Partner on a robust, sustainable cloud first big data architecture, data lake, data mart and other assorted reporting/distribution services with the data engineering teams Partner with data science team to apply advanced analytics concepts towards rich and bold insights Attract, develop, retain talent and improving productivity, efficiency and effectiveness of the team and / or business. Create and manage standards, processes and procedures to ensure agile delivery and consistent operations. KEY QUALIFICATIONS: 10+ years of experience leading analytical practice, reporting, 7+ years of analytical leadership experience across Regression(Linear/Logit/Gamma), K-Means/Modes/Hier. Clustering, Markov Chain Monte Carlo, Non Linear Time Series.

Text mining, Dynamic Programming, Hypothesis testing, OR and Optimization techniques, Fraud Analytics etc. Proven track record of delivering highly-scalable and reliable systems through multiple cycles. Experience on Microsoft BI stack and exposure to Big Data, machine learning and data mining, large scale computing systems like COSMOS, Hadoop, MapReduce and other big data technologies including experience in SQL, R, Python, SAS, AzureML or similar languages. Great design and BI architecture skills, partnering with engineering & information architecture teams on design & architecture Excellent communications and interpersonal skills.

Ability to convince other strong personalities of their ideas and work with a large number of partners in solving a problem. Masters in Statistics/Econometrics or PhD in Statistics/Economics/ Computer Science or related discipline is preferable, but a candidate with MS combined with strong analytical background in problems relating to Big Data and Analytics is also acceptable. PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES/INTERPERSONAL SKILLS: o Excellent written and oral communication skills, particularly the ability to synthesize complex issues/scenarios into easy-to-understand concepts. o An attention to detail with self-discipline and a drive for results.

o Demonstrated ability to work in ambiguous situations and across organizational boundaries. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. As one of the largest divisions inside Microsoft - with over 21,500 employees worldwide - this diverse team includes architects, consultants, support professionals, sales, and business leaders who serve customers in 191 countries and 46 languages. Simply put, we help customers get the most out of their technology investments. We are proud to be the face of Microsoft to many of our customers and partners. The power of that connection, in addition to understanding how they use our products, helps us deliver the voice of our customers back to our business groups to make our technology and Microsoft even better.

discription:
This Job is eligible for the following work arrangements : Flex Time
The Services Insights team is chartered to enable positive business outcomes by driving right behaviors and decisions through bold insights. The Data Scientist is a linchpin role working within the Services Business Insights team. This person will work with cross-functional teams across the Services organization to effectively manage and deliver on Insights & Analytics, operations and transformation. In this critical Program, you will be responsible for executing on business objectives through analytical modeling that incorporate HQ functions, consulting domain leadership and area/field leadership thereby creating transparency around insights & analytics initiatives through a rhythm of the business (ROB). You will execute on the detailed implementation, and support of analytical models, tools and techniques including process changes that are part of this program. We are looking for a talented and motivated analytics professional who can build predictive models and solve a wide variety of predictive analytics problems - all with the goal of providing actionable insights into business processes and customer experience. You will contribute to continuing the team s progress toward being a recognized hub for forward thinking in the field of advanced data analytics. The team consists of experts in statistical data analysis, machine learning, driver analysis, forecasting, big data technologies, fraud analytics, and clickstream analytics etc. For the right individual, this job offers a gateway to an ocean of opportunities in the area of: Predicting customers  next issues to solve them proactively Implementing production natural language processing and classification Building simulations to test and optimize processes Providing analytics on clickstream data for as many customers each year as Facebook has users Using data to optimize sales opportunities, identify support issues and understand customers Proactively identifying service and quality issues before customers realize there is a problem Detecting fraud and preventing loss of millions of dollars KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES: Build and develop analytical models working along side a strong team of Leads, Analysts, Architects to deliver priority outcomes in alignment with the strategic roadmap for Services Engage broadly with the Decision Science teams to frame, structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact Act as an evangelist and catalyst for BI & Analytics innovation Manage the portfolio of work for BI & Analytics and partner with decision science team on monthly governance with stakeholders Partner on a robust, sustainable cloud first big data architecture, data lake, data mart and other assorted reporting/distribution services with the data engineering teams Partner with data science team to apply advanced analytics concepts towards rich and bold insights Attract, develop, retain talent and improving productivity, efficiency and effectiveness of the team and / or business. Create and manage standards, processes and procedures to ensure agile delivery and consistent operations. KEY QUALIFICATIONS: 6+ years of analytical hands on experience across Regression(Linear/Logit/Gamma), K-Means/Modes/Hier. Clustering, Markov Chain Monte Carlo, Non Linear Time Series. Text mining, Dynamic Programming, Hypothesis testing, OR and Optimization techniques, Fraud Analytics etc. Proven track record of delivering highly-scalable and reliable systems through multiple cycles. Experience on Microsoft BI stack and exposure to Big Data, machine learning and data mining, large scale computing systems like COSMOS, Hadoop, MapReduce and other big data technologies including experience in SQL, R, Python, SAS, AzureML or similar languages. Design and BI architecture skills, partnering with engineering & information architecture teams on design & architecture Excellent communications and interpersonal skills. Ability to convince other strong personalities of their ideas and work with a large number of partners in solving a problem. Masters in Statistics/Econometrics or PhD in Statistics/Economics/ Computer Science or related discipline is preferable, but a candidate with MS combined with strong analytical background in problems relating to Big Data and Analytics is also acceptable. PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES/INTERPERSONAL SKILLS: o Excellent written and oral communication skills, particularly the ability to synthesize complex issues/scenarios into easy-to-understand concepts. o An attention to detail with self-discipline and a drive for results. o Demonstrated ability to work in ambiguous situations and across organizational boundaries. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin, marital status, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected status. Microsoft Services is dedicated to delivering on Microsoft s mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As one of the largest divisions inside Microsoft - with over 21,500 employees worldwide - this diverse team includes architects, consultants, support professionals, sales, and business leaders who serve customers in 191 countries and 46 languages. Simply put, we help customers get the most out of their technology investments. We are proud to be the face of Microsoft to many of our customers and partners. The power of that connection, in addition to understanding how they use our products, helps us deliver the voice of our customers back to our business groups to make our technology and Microsoft even better.

discription:
Job Description

About the Organization
Ubisoft is a leading creator, publisher and distributor of interactive entertainment and services, with a rich portfolio of world-renowned brands. The teams throughout Ubisoft's worldwide network of studios and business offices are committed to delivering original and memorable gaming experiences across all popular platforms.

Ubisoft Pune is proud to be one of the most creative video game studios in India. The studio was established in in 2008 and today it's becomes more than 600 talented employees ranging many areas of expertise and growing unit which specializes in console and mobile game
development, quality control and web services.
We favor diversity, creativity, drive and team spirit. If you've got the skills and the desire to succeed, we want you to be a part of this exciting period of growth.
Designation: - - Tools, test automation and productivity Manager
Job Summary: - The primary purpose of this role is to bring in more ideas on how automation techniques be applied in game testing. To bring in more applicable new techniques and methodology to foray. To work closely with Unit Managers to improvise the existing test process.
Job Responsibilities:
Responsible for applying automated tools to support the testing of applications across all phases of the Game Development Life Cycle.

Evaluate the functional and non-functional requirements for testability and the test cases and use cases for suitability for automation

Implement the strategy via developing, coding and executing test case and test script frameworks using automated tools

Automation requirement analysis, creating automation test strategy/plan, test estimation, script creation, test scripts execution, defect management and test progress reporting to stakeholders.

Support the test team by recommending tools and processes to automate other test activities, such as test management,reporting, test data generation and defect management.

Understand the impact of change in requirement or bug fix from functional perspective or at code level.

Conduct automation feasibility study, automate tests and maintain automation framework/scripts.

Propose and present new ideas and concepts to improve products and testing methods.

Keep abreast of changes in product architecture/design as well as developments in the related domain/technology.

Act as a bridge between the production team and the dev testers.

Identifying and Implementing appropriate test metrics for effective test management.

Involve in the new tool development, or enhancement of the existing tools.

Communicating effectively with development teams and testers.

** These responsibilities are not limitative and can be modified in order to reach the company's goals
and objectives as well as personal performance.
Personal Specifications: -

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

Minimum 7 years of in-depth experience on automation testing

Experiences using scripting languages such as Python, ruby, perl etc to execute test
frameworks.

Experience of working on automation tools and driving automation strategy

Practical experience in analyzing, designing, and developing solutions to highly complex
problems

Ideal candidate would be someone who has spent initial tenure as a developer

Experience creating automated tests at the unit, integration and performance/load level
and integrating those tests into a continuous build environment.

Understanding of object oriented design and Agile methodologies.

Strong interpersonal and communications skills and an ability to understand and articulate complex ideas and concepts in both verbal and written form

Motivated self-starting individual; team player to collaborate with local and remote teams. Qualifications

null

Additional Information

null

-

170010694

Job Description

The Business Analyst I - BI Developer role will provide advance reporting, as well as analytics research expertise ultimately providing a high level of improved customer service. Within the Branch Analytics Team the Business Analyst I will be working on Data visualization and representation of Branch Operations data. The candidate will be expected to: Contribute to data visualization and reporting on Branch and other retail operations data. Exhibit thought leadership and demonstrate analytical thinking to drive insights from data Identify new opportunities to bring new process improvements. Communicate data findings through engaging stories that are easy to understand quickly assesses the big picture in complex situations and identify what is critical routinely make decisions for best course of action and to drive business solutions. Support internal and external processes and workflows, suggest improvements based on data analysis and provide insights into the enterprise operations. Work with business domain experts to identify data relevant for analysis Provide and apply quality assurance best practices for analysis/reporting services. Develop new visualization methods and/or tools as required. Extract/Generate reports/ data, analyze and provide recommendations for the project undertaken.
The candidate will be expected to:
Partner with onshore leaders to drive projects assigned to the team

Contribute to data mining architectures, modeling standards, reporting, and data analysis methodologies

Exhibit thought leadership and demonstrate analytical thinking to drive insights from data

Perform in depth analysis to resolve a business problem by employing the appropriate tools available in the enterprise

Identify new opportunities to bring new process improvements.

Communicate data findings through engaging stories that are easy to understand

Quickly assesses the big picture in complex situations and identify what is critical

Routinely make decisions for best course of action and to drive business solutions

Support internal and external processes and workflows, suggest improvements based on data analysis and provide insights into the enterprise operations

Work with business domain experts to identify data relevant for analysis

Provide and apply quality assurance best practices for data mining/analysis services

Develop new analytical methods and/or tools as required.

Adhere to change control and testing processes for modifications to analytical models

Collaborate with unit managers, end users, development staff, and other stakeholders to integrate data mining results with existing systems

Extract reports/ data, analyze and provide recommendations for the project undertaken

Respond to and resolve data mining performance issues. Monitor data mining system performance and implement efficiency improvements

Qualifications
Qualifications:
The candidate should have 5+ years of relevant experience in Operations Research and Analytics

Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Statistics, modeling or data Analytics

Strong Retail Banking is a must

Experience working with the US Retail market is a plus

Experience of working with International Partners in an Offshore and Onshore model is a plus

Demonstrated proficiency with Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint)

Proficiency in critical thinking and problem solving

Strong verbal and written communication skills

Strong understanding of data mining models, structures, theories, principles, and practices, including machine learning, statistics and text mining techniques

Excellent knowledge of statistical and modeling tools such as SAS, R, Python and SQL

Experience in large scale data handling

Ability to guide and conduct research and drive valuable insights from data

Strong familiarity and experience with statistics, modeling, segmentation, optimization, forecasting, demand mitigation is a must

Should have strong understanding of Queuing theory

Experience of visualization tools like Tableau is good to have

discription: Dear Job Seeker,We have openings for PHP DEVELOPER (Consideration of candidates with product based company background only) for Pune location.About Company :It is one of India’s leading mobile application developer. We allow brands to build their own custom mobile app which help restaurants, hotels, spas, salons, musicians, artists, art galleries, etc in connecting and engaging with their audience effectively.Location : PuneExperience : 2 – 5 YearsFunction : Technology - IT & SystemsNo of Openings: 5 Job Description :We are looking for a PHP Developer who possesses a passion for pushing Web technologies to the limits and will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our DIY platform for mobile application. Responsibilities:· Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.· Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.· Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.· Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency. Requirements:· BE/BTech degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject· 2+ years of experience as a PHP Developer· Excellent skills with PHP or any other server side technology.· Should have hands on experience with java, Ruby on rails, python,· Should have hands on experience with RDBMS like My SQL.· Experience handling Amazon webservices for cloud management.· Should be able to work on 3rd party API integrations· Working knowledge of the general web landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies· Solid understanding of the full product development life cycle· An in-depth understanding of Object Oriented concepts, data structures and algorithms· Proficiency in writing cross-browser and mobile code· Experience with JSON Parsing and Web Services· Experience in source control such as Git and SVN· Working knowledge of WAMP/LAMP stack and open source software· Experience in creating and consuming RESTful APIs· Experience in an Agile development environment· A go-getter attitude and self-motivation 3 rounds of interview (all 3 will be PI)1st - coding test2nd - Questionaire (1st two rounds will be held on the same day)3rd - Final round Qualification : B.E / B.TechWorking Days : 5 Days a Week (10:00 AM to 7:00 PM)Job Nature : Full Time PLEASE APPLY IF YOU ARE INTERESTED
